original_text:
Under the whole heaven he lets it go,
    and his lightning to the corners of the earth.
korean_text: 그 소리를 천하에 펼치시며 번갯불을 땅 끝까지 이르게 하시고

sentences.original_text: Under the whole heaven he lets it go
sentences.korean_translation: 온 하늘 아래에서 그가 그것을 보내시니

sentences.original_text: and his lightning to the corners of the earth.
